title: What are the best decentralized alternatives to YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: There aren’t any truly decentralized alternatives that I’m aware of. Anything that relies on the “internet” as we know it cannot truly be decentralized. That being said, the most decentralized alternatives I’m aware of are PeerTube and perhaps IPFSTube. IPFSTube doesn’t really have an interface, you could only really share a link to a video. PeerTube on the other hand gives you a ton of options and is very much a decent platform.
